attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Quango OFSTED has diverted the efforts of teachers from teaching to meeting meaningless targets and has contributed to the fall in educational standards over the last 15 years.
Ofsted costs over £200,000,000 to administer per year.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
